mapper.select: select sfid,name,clubregisteredphone__c,bahns__c from accountsource where sfid in (select customer__c from customerhousebinding__c where systemmodstamp > (select value__c from systemparamter__c where name = 'account_update')::TIMESTAMP)
SELECT * FROM accountsource WHERE clubuser__c = #{param} OR clubRegisteredPhone__c =#{param}
